# Competitive Intelligence Report

*Generated by MaSteel â€” 2023-10-05*

---

## [Stripe](https://stripe.com)

### Positioning
Stripe positions itself as a comprehensive financial infrastructure provider, enabling businesses of all sizes to accept payments, send payouts, and automate financial processes through a suite of APIs and no-code tools.

### Pricing
| Plan | Description | Price |
|---|---|---|
| Standard | Transaction fees vary by country and payment method. | Varies |
| Pro Plan | Billed monthly, $0.01 per 1,000 tokens used. | $0.01 per 1,000 tokens |

### Key Features
- Global payment processing in 135+ currencies.
- Support for various payment methods including cards, wallets, and bank transfers.
- Advanced fraud detection with Radar.
- Subscription management with Stripe Billing.
- Customizable checkout experiences.

### Tech Stack / Infrastructure
- Supports 135+ currencies and payment methods.
- 99.999% historical uptime.
- Processes over $1.4 trillion in payments volume annually.

---

## [Braintree](https://braintree.com)

### Positioning
Braintree focuses on providing a seamless payment experience for businesses, emphasizing ease of integration and support for various payment methods, including PayPal and Venmo.

### Pricing
| Plan | Description | Price |
|---|---|---|
| Standard | Transaction fees vary by country and payment method. | Varies |

### Key Features
- Support for PayPal, Venmo, credit and debit cards.
- Recurring billing and subscription management.
- Advanced fraud protection tools.

### Tech Stack / Infrastructure
- Offers a robust API for easy integration.
- Focus on mobile and web payment solutions.

---

## [Adyen](https://adyen.com)

### Positioning
Adyen positions itself as a global payment company that provides a seamless payment experience for businesses, integrating various payment methods into a single platform.

### Pricing
| Payment Method | Description | Price |
|---|---|---|
| Card Payments | Transaction fees vary by card type and region. | Varies |
| Alternative Payments | Fees depend on the payment method used. | Varies |

### Key Features
- Unified commerce solutions for online, mobile, and in-store payments.
- Support for 135+ currencies and payment methods.
- Real-time data insights and reporting.

### Tech Stack / Infrastructure
- Built for scalability and reliability.
- Supports a wide range of payment methods globally.

---

## Comparison Table

| Feature / Category | Stripe | Braintree | Adyen |
|---|---|---|---|
| Pricing Model | Transaction-based | Transaction-based | Transaction-based |
| Key Differentiator | Comprehensive API and global reach | Focus on mobile and web payments | Unified commerce platform |
| Target Audience | Businesses of all sizes | E-commerce and mobile apps | Global enterprises |
| Tech Signals | 99.999% uptime, 135+ currencies | Robust API, mobile focus | Scalable infrastructure, real-time insights |

---

## Summary
Stripe stands out with its extensive global reach and comprehensive feature set, making it suitable for businesses of all sizes. Adyen offers a strong unified commerce solution, while Braintree focuses on mobile and web payment experiences. There are opportunities for Braintree to enhance its feature set and for Adyen to improve its pricing transparency.
